title: Calories in a Hershey's Kiss
meta_description: Discover calories in a Hershey's Kiss, including full nutrition breakdown like fat, carbs, protein, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard milk chocolate Hershey's Kiss, approximately 4.6 g each, no fillings or special varieties.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, batch, size, and manufacturer. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A single Hershey's Kiss provides about 22 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: About 22 kcal per standard milk chocolate Kiss.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: Approximately 2.6 g total carbs, including 2.4 g sugars and 0.2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is there protein in Hershey's Kisses?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.3 g protein per Kiss from milk solids.

faqs.q: How much fat in one Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: 1.3 g total fat, with 0.8 g saturated fat.
Very low, around 3 mg per Kiss.
